Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the speed at which the hospital building was constructed, stating it was completed in 16 hours.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to verify the construction time of the hospital building.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo shows the actual hospital building constructed in 16 hours, without considering alternative explanations or possibilities.
Exist alternative explanation: The photo has been found on various websites advertising temporary structures and modular homes, suggesting that it may not be directly related to the hospital building in Wuhan.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the expert's verdict, which states that the image was shared in a misleading context and does not accurately represent the hospital building construction.
